title: Customized Digital Learning Design for Adult Literacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A university-affiliated lifelong education program supporting multicultural families or literacy-education vulnerable populations

learning_goals: Read and comprehend basic Korean sentences for one hour, three times weekly, using digital platforms
Learners can accurately use 50 core vocabulary items related to daily life within 4 weeks through personalized content.
Learners can complete 1 short writing piece reflecting their experiences through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
